titles.title: Electing Members to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

bill.summary: 1/28/2009--Passed House without amendment. Elects certain named Majority Members to the House Committees on Homeland Security and on Oversight and Government Reform.
